Thanks for your response. But you could have safely assumed that 
anyone as=
king for use of Junit for web services would necessarily 
have common sense=
 of using any of the major search engines. Instead 
of sermons on helping m=
e exercise search engine skills, some 
concrete info would have been more u=
seful (for example, look at 
other responses on this topic).
